short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block Distracting websites and redirects the user to Pundegai Productivity coach

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is part of a Productivity coaching services offered by Pundegai.com. The extension prevents the user from opening distracting websites (ex. Instagram, Facebook, etc.) during a scheduled work time (11PM to 5PM). During this time, the user will be redirected to the Pundegai.com where they can access cognitive tools like meditation and NSDR protocols that would help them improve focus and attention.
